description.zh-cn: 马克思主义的一个流派，由列夫·托洛茨基建立，主张通过不断革命和无产阶级国际主义实现世界社会主义。
description.en: A school of Marxism established by Leon Trotsky, advocating for world socialism through permanent revolution and proletarian internationalism.

description.zh-cn: 俄国马克思主义革命家，托洛茨基主义的创建者，曾任十月革命实际指挥者、苏联红军缔造者、第三国际及第四国际创建者。
description.en: A Russian Marxist revolutionary, founder of Trotskyism, who served as the de facto commander of the October Revolution, founder of the Red Army, and founder of the Third and Fourth Internationals.

description.zh-cn: 由卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯创立的理论体系，是共产主义的思想基础。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, which is the ideological basis of communism.

description.zh-cn: 由弗拉基米尔·列宁发展的马克思主义理论，强调先锋党在无产阶级革命中的领导作用。
description.en: A Marxist theory developed by Vladimir Lenin that emphasizes the leading role of a vanguard party in the proletarian revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1917年俄国发生的一场社会主义革命，由布尔什维克党领导，建立了苏维埃政权。
description.en: A socialist revolution in Russia in 1917, led by the Bolshevik Party, which established the Soviet regime.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃俄国和苏联的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际性的共产党组织，旨在推动世界革命。
description.en: An international communist organization that aimed to promote world revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由列夫·托洛茨基及其支持者于1938年成立的国际托洛茨基主义组织。
description.en: An international Trotskyist organization founded in 1938 by Leon Trotsky and his supporters.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记，苏联部长会议主席。其执政时期被称为斯大林时期。
description.en: Soviet politician who served as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Soviet Union. His rule is known as the Stalin era.

description.zh-cn: 指约瑟夫·斯大林执政时期苏联的政治经济体制和意识形态，以一党专政、个人崇拜、中央集权和计划经济为特征。
description.en: Refers to the political and economic system and ideology of the Soviet Union during Joseph Stalin's rule, characterized by one-party rule, a cult of personality, centralism, and a planned economy.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基提出的马克思主义理论，主张在落后国家，无产阶级应将民主革命转变为社会主义革命，并推动世界革命。
description.en: A Marxist theory proposed by Trotsky, which argues that in backward countries, the proletariat should transform the democratic revolution into a socialist revolution and promote world revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由斯大林在1924年提出的理论，认为苏联可以在没有国际革命的情况下独立建成社会主义社会。
description.en: A theory proposed by Stalin in 1924, arguing that the Soviet Union could build a socialist society on its own without international revolution.

description.zh-cn: 俄国共产主义革命家、政治家和政治理论家，布尔什维克党的创建者和领导人，苏维埃俄国和苏联的第一位领导人。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, founder and leader of the Bolshevik Party, and the first leader of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union.

nodes.id: 尼古拉·伊万诺维奇·布哈林

zh-cn: 尼古拉·伊万诺维奇·布哈林

description.zh-cn: 苏联布尔什维克革命家和政治家，曾为共产国际执委会主席，后在斯大林的大清洗中被处决。
description.en: A Soviet Bolshevik revolutionary and politician, who served as Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International, and was later executed during Stalin's Great Purge.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基在1936年撰写的著作，分析和批判了苏联在斯大林统治下的官僚化堕落。
description.en: A book written by Leon Trotsky in 1936 that analyzes and criticizes the bureaucratic degeneration of the Soviet Union under Stalin's rule.

description.zh-cn: 一名苏联内务人民委员部的特工，于1940年在墨西哥奉斯大林之命刺杀了列夫·托洛茨基。
description.en: A Soviet NKVD agent who, on Stalin's orders, assassinated Leon Trotsky in Mexico in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆社会主义国家，由多个苏维埃共和国组成。
description.en: A socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991, composed of multiple Soviet republics.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义理论中的一个概念，用以形容苏联虽然保留了国有化的生产资料，但政治权力被一个官僚阶层所篡夺，不再是真正的无产阶级专政国家。
description.en: A concept in Trotskyist theory used to describe the Soviet Union, where although nationalized means of production were preserved, political power was usurped by a bureaucratic caste, and it was no longer a true proletarian dictatorship.

description.zh-cn: 1936年至1939年在西班牙发生的内战，由西班牙第二共和国的共和派与佛朗哥领导的国民军之间的战争。
description.en: A civil war in Spain fought from 1936 to 1939 between the Republicans of the Second Spanish Republic and the Nationalists led by Francisco Franco.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基思想的倡导者和追随者所组成的政治群体。
description.en: The political group composed of advocates and followers of Trotsky's ideas.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, politician and theorist, who was the main founder of the People's Republic of China and its first paramount leader.

en: Great Purge of Trotskyists in China

description.zh-cn: 1952年12月22日，中华人民共和国政府在全国范围内对托洛茨基主义者进行的大规模逮捕和镇压行动。
description.en: A large-scale arrest and suppression campaign against Trotskyists throughout the People's Republic of China on December 22, 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、新文化运动的主要倡导者之一，中国共产党的创始人和早期主要领导人，后成为中国托洛茨基主义的代表人物。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and a key advocate of the New Culture Movement, a founder and early key leader of the Communist Party of China, who later became a representative figure of Chinese Trotskyism.

nodes.id: 中国共产党左派反对派

zh-cn: 中国共产党左派反对派
en: Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1931年由中国多个托洛茨基主义组织统一而成的政党，陈独秀任总书记。
description.en: A political party formed in 1931 by the unification of several Trotskyist organizations in China, with Chen Duxiu as its General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 由陈独秀于1929年9月创办的中国托洛茨基主义组织。
description.en: A Chinese Trotskyist organization founded by Chen Duxiu in September 1929.

nodes.id: 中国布尔什维克列宁主义反对派

zh-cn: 中国布尔什维克列宁主义反对派

description.zh-cn: 中国第一个托洛茨基主义组织，成立于1928年12月。
description.en: The first Trotskyist organization in China, established in December 1928.

description.zh-cn: 由刘仁静等人于1930年1月1日成立的中国托洛茨基主义组织。
description.en: A Chinese Trotskyist organization founded on January 1, 1930 by Liu Renjing and others.

description.zh-cn: 由赵济等人于1930年夏成立的中国托洛茨基主义组织。
description.en: A Chinese Trotskyist organization founded in the summer of 1930 by Zhao Ji and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国的历史性政党，由孙中山创立，在中华民国历史上长期执政。
description.en: A historical political party in China founded by Sun Yat-sen, which was the long-term ruling party in the history of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 以毛泽东思想为基础的马克思列宁主义变体，强调农民在革命中的作用和持续革命的重要性。
description.en: A variant of Marxism-Leninism based on the thought of Mao Zedong, emphasizing the role of the peasantry in revolution and the importance of continuous revolution.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔巴尼亚劳动党第一书记恩维尔·霍查提出的一种反修正主义的马克思列宁主义理论。
description.en: An anti-revisionist Marxist-Leninist theory proposed by Enver Hoxha, First Secretary of the Party of Labour of Albania.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是托洛茨基主义最早的理论建立者。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was the earliest theoretical founder of Trotskyism.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义是马克思主义的一个流派，托洛茨基自视为正统马克思主义者。
description.en: Trotskyism is a school of Marxism, and Trotsky considered himself an orthodox Marxist.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基自视为布尔什维克列宁主义者，其理论继承了列宁主义。
description.en: Trotsky considered himself a Bolshevik-Leninist, and his theories were a continuation of Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是十月革命的实际指挥者。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was the de facto commander of the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是苏联红军的缔造者和领导者。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was the founder and leader of the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是第三国际的创建者之一。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was one of the founders of the Third International.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是第四国际的创建者和精神领袖。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was the founder and spiritual leader of the Fourth International.

description.zh-cn: 在1920年代，托洛茨基和斯大林成为政治敌人，并在此后反对对方对列宁主义的阐释。
description.en: In the 1920s, Trotsky and Stalin became political enemies and subsequently opposed each other's interpretations of Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林将托洛茨基及其领导的左翼反对派强力镇压，并于1929年将其流放出苏联。
description.en: Stalin forcefully suppressed Trotsky and the Left Opposition he led, and exiled him from the Soviet Union in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义者批判斯大林时期苏联的官僚主义和反民主思潮，而斯大林主义者则将托派视为反革命势力。
description.en: Trotskyists criticized the bureaucracy and anti-democratic trends in the Soviet Union during the Stalin era, while Stalinists viewed Trotskyists as a counter-revolutionary force.

description.zh-cn: 1905年，托洛茨基提出了他的不断革命理论。
description.en: In 1905, Trotsky proposed his theory of permanent revolution.

description.zh-cn: 不断革命论后来成为托洛茨基主义的一个决定性特征。
description.en: The theory of permanent revolution later became a defining feature of Trotskyism.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基的不断革命论与斯大林采纳的一国社会主义理论相对立。
description.en: Trotsky's theory of permanent revolution was opposed to the theory of Socialism in One Country adopted by Stalin.

relationships.source: 尼古拉·伊万诺维奇·布哈林

description.zh-cn: 布哈林提出“一国社会主义”理论。
description.en: Bukharin proposed the theory of 'Socialism in One Country'.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林于1924年接纳了布哈林的“一国社会主义”理论。
description.en: Stalin adopted Bukharin's theory of 'Socialism in One Country' in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基撰写了《被背叛的革命》一书，批判斯大林主义。
description.en: Trotsky wrote the book 'The Revolution Betrayed', criticizing Stalinism.

description.zh-cn: 该书猛烈批评斯大林主义，分析了苏联的官僚化堕落。
description.en: The book fiercely criticized Stalinism and analyzed the bureaucratic degeneration of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义者称苏联为“堕落的工人国家”，并支持在苏联进行一场政治革命以重建社会主义民主。
description.en: Trotskyists referred to the Soviet Union as a 'degenerated workers' state' and supported a political revolution within it to re-establish socialist democracy.

description.zh-cn: “堕落的工人国家”是托洛茨基主义者用以描述斯大林时期苏联政治性质的理论概念。
description.en: 'Degenerated workers' state' is a theoretical concept used by Trotskyists to describe the political nature of the Soviet Union during the Stalin era.

description.zh-cn: 作为苏联政府的密探，拉蒙·麦卡德在墨西哥城刺杀了托洛茨基。
description.en: As a Soviet government agent, Ramón Mercader assassinated Trotsky in Mexico City.

description.zh-cn: 在西班牙内战中，斯大林主义路线清剿托洛茨基主义者并从西班牙撤军，最终导致了工人阶级的惨败和法西斯的胜利。
description.en: During the Spanish Civil War, the Stalinist line involved purging Trotskyists and withdrawing troops from Spain, which ultimately led to the crushing defeat of the working class and the victory of fascism.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1952年12月22日发动“大肃托”，在全国范围内镇压托洛茨基主义者。
description.en: Mao Zedong launched the 'Great Purge of Trotskyists' on December 22, 1952, suppressing Trotskyists nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 在此次运动中，中国大陆的托洛茨基主义者遭到大规模逮捕和关押。
description.en: In this campaign, Trotskyists in mainland China were subjected to mass arrests and imprisonment.

relationships.target: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 在陈独秀的号召下，中国的四个托洛茨基主义组织于1931年5月统一成立了“中国共产党左派反对派”。
description.en: At the call of Chen Duxiu, four Trotskyist organizations in China united in May 1931 to form the 'Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 无产者社是合并成立中国共产党左派反对派的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The Proletarian Society was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国布尔什维克列宁主义反对派
relationships.target: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 中国布尔什维克列宁主义反对派是合并成立中国共产党左派反对派的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The Chinese Bolshevik-Leninist Opposition was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 十月社是合并成立中国共产党左派反对派的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The October Society was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 战斗社是合并成立中国共产党左派反对派的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The Combat Society was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党左派反对派成立不久便遭到中国国民党当局的严重破坏。
description.en: Shortly after its establishment, the Left Opposition of the Communist Party of China was severely undermined by the Kuomintang authorities.

description.zh-cn: 由于叛徒出卖，陈独秀被国民党特务捕获并关押。
description.en: Due to betrayal, Chen Duxiu was captured and imprisoned by Kuomintang secret agents.

description.zh-cn: 毛主义者将托洛茨基主义视为“小资产阶级的激进思潮”，并进行批判。
description.en: Maoists view Trotskyism as a 'petty-bourgeois radical trend' and criticize it.

description.zh-cn: 霍查主义者将“托派”视为政治上的贬义词，用以攻击政敌。
description.en: Hoxhaists use 'Trotskyite' as a political pejorative to attack their political enemies.
